abstract: Unilever, the consumer goods giant, is considering the sale of its Italian frozen food business, Findus Italy, for up to 800 million euros, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: Unilever, the consumer goods giant, is considering the sale of its Italian frozen food business, Findus Italy, for up to 800 million euros, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Consumer goods giant Unilever is considering a sale of its Italian frozen food business, Findus Italy, for up to 800 million euros, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Private Equity Shops Consider a Unilever Unit, Report Says
